oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oral history interview with Frances Lusky, 1976 July 21, excerpt 01
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from an oral history interview with Frances Lusky, conducted on 21 July 1976 by Leonard Wood as part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. Tennessee Centennial Project. Lusky discusses the lights, fireworks, and going to hear John Philip Sousa's band at the Centennial. The complete interview is available in the Special Collections Division.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lusky, Frances Blum, 1890-1980--Interviews; Sousa, John Philip, 1854-1932
Tennessee Centennial and International Exposition (1897 : Nashville, Tenn.); Sousa Band
